attributes.action: Force ALL MPs to pay back expenses on second homes (including those they have 'flipped) - we are in a recession!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are in a recession and our Government has borrowed so much money that the current generation will never outlive the cost for repaying this debt!

And yet, MPs (whether it is perceived as non-criminal) are fleecing the Taxpayers, when we are told by the same Government to 'tighten the purse strings'. Is it not criminal for MPs to stand-by and watch people lose their jobs, homes and dignity while they claim for dog-food and light bulbs?

ALL MPs should be made (by a new law) to pay back ALL their claimed expenses on second homes (including those they 'flipped').

Let's make Britain great again!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
